name: Gryffin
description: '''Daniel Griffith''' (born September 29, 1987), known by his stage name '''Gryffin''' (often stylized as '''GRYFFIN'''), is an American musician, DJ, and music producer. He gained recognition for remixing some well-known songs such as [[Tove Lo]]'s "[[Talking Body]]", [[Maroon 5]]'s "[[Animals (Maroon 5 song)|Animals]]" and [[Years & Years]]' "[[Desire (Years & Years song)|Desire]]".
